statements: SELECT * FROM music_repertoire;
SELECT composer_name, composition_title FROM music_repertoire;
SELECT * FROM music_repertoire WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT composer_name, COUNT(composer_name) AS composer_count FROM music_repertoire GROUP BY composer_name;
SELECT * FROM music_repertoire ORDER BY studied_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_repertoire WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY studied_date DESC;
SELECT composition_title, composer_name FROM music_repertoire WHERE studied_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT DISTINCT composer_name FROM music_repertoire WHERE composition_id > 100 ORDER BY composer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_repertoire WHERE composition_title LIKE '%Sonata%' AND composer_name LIKE '%Beethoven%' ORDER BY composition_id ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(composition_id) AS compositions_studied FROM music_repertoire GROUP BY student_id HAVING compositions_studied > 3 ORDER BY compositions_studied DESC;
SELECT * FROM music_repertoire;
SELECT music_piece_title, composer FROM music_repertoire WHERE music_piece_id = 1;
SELECT composer, music_piece_title FROM music_repertoire WHERE student_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM student_compositions WHERE composer = 'Beethoven';
SELECT composition_title, student_id FROM student_compositions WHERE composer = 'Mozart';
SELECT * FROM music_repertoire WHERE composer='Bach';
SELECT music_piece_title, composer FROM music_repertoire ORDER BY music_piece_title DESC;
SELECT music_piece_title, composer FROM music_repertoire WHERE composer='Mozart' AND student_id=1;
SELECT * FROM student_compositions WHERE composer='Beethoven' ORDER BY composition_title ASC;
SELECT music_piece_title, composer FROM music_repertoire WHERE composer='Chopin' OR composer='Schubert';
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM Students WHERE study_program = 'Computer Science';
SELECT title, composer_name FROM Compositions ORDER BY composer_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, title, genre FROM Students JOIN Repertoire ON Students.student_id = Repertoire.student_id JOIN Compositions ON Repertoire.composition_id = Compositions.composition_id;
SELECT * FROM Repertoire WHERE student_id = 1 AND composition_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, study_program FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT title, genre FROM Compositions WHERE genre = 'Classical';

SELECT Students.student_name, Compositions.title FROM Students JOIN Repertoire ON Students.student_id = Repertoire.student_id JOIN Compositions ON Repertoire.composition_id = Compositions.composition_id;

SELECT student_name, title, genre FROM Students JOIN Repertoire ON Students.student_id = Repertoire.student_id JOIN Compositions ON Repertoire.composition_id = Compositions.composition_id ORDER BY student_name DESC, title ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM students ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT composition_id, title, composer FROM compositions WHERE composer = 'Beethoven';
SELECT repertoire_id, student_id, composition_id FROM repertoire WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT s.first_name, c.title FROM students s JOIN studied_compositions sc ON s.student_id = sc.student_id JOIN compositions c ON sc.composition_id = c.composition_id ORDER BY s.first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM repertoire WHERE difficulty_level IN ('Intermediate', 'Advanced') ORDER BY composer ASC, title DESC;
SELECT c.title, c.composer, sc.rating FROM compositions c JOIN studied_compositions sc ON c.id = sc.composition_id WHERE sc.student_id = 123 ORDER BY sc.rating DESC, c.composer ASC;

SELECT s.first_name, s.last_name, c.title, c.composer, rc.date_completed FROM students s JOIN studied_compositions sc ON s.id = sc.student_id JOIN compositions c ON sc.composition_id = c.id JOIN repertoire_completed rc ON sc.id = rc.studied_composition_id WHERE rc.result = 'Pass' ORDER BY rc.date_completed DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, birthdate FROM students WHERE level = 'Beginner';
SELECT composition_id, composition_title, composer FROM compositions WHERE year_composed > 2000;
SELECT student_name, composition_title FROM students JOIN repertoire ON students.student_id = repertoire.student_id JOIN compositions ON repertoire.composition_id = compositions.composition_id;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id IN (SELECT genre_id FROM composition_genre WHERE composition_id = 1);
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, birthdate FROM students ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT student_name, level FROM students WHERE level='Intermediate';
SELECT compositions.composition_title, compositions.composer, repertoire.date_studied FROM compositions JOIN repertoire ON compositions.composition_id = repertoire.composition_id;

SELECT students.student_name, compositions.composition_title, genres.genre_name FROM students JOIN repertoire ON students.student_id = repertoire.student_id JOIN compositions ON repertoire.composition_id = compositions.composition_id JOIN composition_genre ON compositions.composition_id = composition_genre.composition_id JOIN genres ON composition_genre.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
